wolfies-imessage.name: iMessage Gateway
wolfies-imessage.description: High-performance iMessage CLI (19x faster than MCP). Send, read, search messages with contact intelligence.
post_install: Grant Full Disk Access to python3.11 in System Settings

wolfies-gmail.name: Gmail MCP
wolfies-gmail.description: Gmail MCP server for Claude Code. List, search, read, and send emails.
post_install: claude mcp add -t stdio gmail -- wolfies-gmail-mcp

wolfies-calendar.name: Google Calendar MCP
wolfies-calendar.description: Google Calendar MCP server for Claude Code. List events, find free time, create events.
post_install: claude mcp add -t stdio google-calendar -- wolfies-calendar-mcp

wolfies-reminders.name: Apple Reminders MCP
wolfies-reminders.description: Apple Reminders MCP server for Claude Code. Create, list, complete reminders.
post_install: Grant Reminders access in System Settings
Grant Automation access in System Settings
claude mcp add -t stdio reminders -- wolfies-reminders-mcp
